|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     - Save the changes and close Notepad.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Now, whenever you double-click the `start_python_path.bat` file, a new command prompt window should open. In this window, the Python interpreter and pip should be accessible from any location because they're included in the PATH variable for this session.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |

It won't affect other command prompt sessions or the system's PATH variable.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | We can modify the `python39._pth` file to add the path to the pip package.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Here are the steps:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               | 1. In the directory where you extracted Python, find the file named `python39._pth`.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | 2. Open this file in a text editor. You'll see a list of directories. This list determines the directories Python will search for packages.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | 3. Add `.` and `./Scripts` to the file and save it. This tells Python to look in the current directory and the Scripts directory for packages. The file should look something like this:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               |     .                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     ./Scripts                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               |     ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               | 1. **Create a batch file**:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     - Right-click anywhere on your Desktop or inside File Explorer (preferably in a location that's easy to access) and select New -> Text Document.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     - Rename the new text file to `start_python.bat`. |      |                                      |               |               |     - If you can't see the extension, open the View tab in File Explorer and check the box that says File name extensions.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | 2. **Edit the batch file**:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     - Right-click on the new batch file and choose Edit. This should open the file in Notepad.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     - Add the following lines to the batch file:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |         ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |         @echo off                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |         set PATH=%PATH%;C:\ibrahho\python;C:\ibrahho\python\Scripts                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |         cmd /k                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |         ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     - Save the changes (File -> Save) and close Notepad.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | This batch file is doing three things:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | 1. `@echo off` stops the command prompt from displaying the commands the batch file runs. This makes the output easier to read.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | 2. `set PATH=%PATH%;C:\ibrahho\python;C:\ibrahho\python\Scripts` adds your Python directory and the Scripts directory (which contains pip) to the PATH environment variable for the current command prompt session. This allows you to run Python and pip from any location in the command prompt.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | 3. `cmd /k` opens a new command prompt window and keeps it open after the commands in the batch file have run. This allows you to interact with the command prompt after running the batch file.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | When you run this batch file (by double-clicking on it), it should open a new command prompt window. In this window, the Python interpreter and pip should be accessible from any location. You can test this by running `python --version` and `pip --version`. If Python and pip are correctly set up, these commands should return the version numbers of Python and pip respectively.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Once Python and pip are working, you should be able to install pandas by running `pip install pandas`.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Remember, changes made to the PATH in this way are only valid for the command prompt session opened by the batch file. If you open a new command prompt window not using the batch file, it will not have the updated PATH.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
